price: तथा हमने हर चीज़ के दो प्रकार बनाए, ताकि तुम नसीहत ग्रहण करो।
arabic: وَمِن كُلِّ شَيۡءٍ خَلَقۡنَا زَوۡجَيۡنِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: Hindi Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indian by Azizul-Haqq Al-Umary.

meta.transliteration: wamin kulli shayin khalaqnā zawjayni laʿallakum tadhakkarūna
